sentences.en: An entrepreneur is more than just a risk taker. He is a visionary.
sentences.cn: 企业家不仅要能承担风险，还应富于远见。

sentences.en: Equally, some employees are great, some managers visionary, some jobs wonderful.
sentences.cn: 同样, 有些员工很棒, 有些经理有远见卓识, 有些工作非常棒.

sentences.en: He had demonstrated to all those obsessed with the tangible the transcendence of visionary.
sentences.cn: 他向所有那些纠缠于眼前事物的人们显示了他的远见卓识.

sentences.en: In fact, it is just a visionary mirage, common to many people.
sentences.cn: 其实这荒漠只是视野中的“海市蜃楼”.

sentences.en: Many are hailing Rendell's ideas as visionary.
sentences.cn: 许多人都称赞伦德尔的想法很有远见。

sentences.en: Many beautiful imaginations will turn to visionary hopes in reality.
sentences.cn: 许多美好的想象,会在现实中化为泡影.

sentences.en: Many visionary nanoscale products will require new manufacturing systems.
sentences.cn: 许多幻想中的纳米产品要求新的制造系统.

sentences.en: Planners of tunnels can now be bold and visionary.
sentences.cn: 因此,隧道规划师不但要果敢而且还要富有远见.

sentences.en: The cool - headed reckoner is the stern chastiser of the ecstatic visionary.
sentences.cn: 头脑冷静的计算者,是梦想家的严厉惩罚人.

sentences.en: The ideas of a visionary may seem impractical to us.
sentences.cn: 在我们看来,空想家的观念好像不切实际.

sentences.en: The opposition saw the potential of film as a creative, visionary medium.
sentences.cn: 反对把电影的潜力看作了有创造性的 、 幻的媒介.

sentences.en: Their visionary ideas are often misunderstood by their own generation.
sentences.cn: 他们的理想往往招致同时代人的误解.

sentences.en: Under his visionary leadership, the city prospered.
sentences.cn: 在他富有远见的领导下，这座城市蓬勃发展。

sentences.en: While Gates was a visionary, Ballmer is simply a businessman.
sentences.cn: 盖茨是有远见的领袖, 鲍尔默则仅仅是一位商人.

sentences.en: White was both visionary and rationalist.
sentences.cn: 怀特既有远见又充满理性。

sentences.en: Words cascaded in torrents from Malraux as he fixed his hearers with his visionary gaze.
sentences.cn: 马尔罗一面用幻想家的眼光把听众吸引住,一面口若悬河,一泻千里.

words.tran_cn: 视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力
空想家；梦想者；有眼力的人

trans.tran_cn: 空想的，幻想的，预言性的，有远见的，有智慧的
trans.tran_en: existing only in someone’s mind and unlikely to ever exist in the real world

trans.tran_cn: 空想家，预言家，有远见的人，有智慧的人
trans.tran_en: someone who has clear ideas and strong feelings about the way something should be in the future
